title: PUBG unit sales worldwide 2018
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Unit sales in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 50.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at May 2017 where Month is 2.0.
The difference of Unit sales in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 48.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 5 number of Months.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month May 2017.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Unit sales in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 50.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at May 2017 where Month is 2.0.
The difference of Unit sales in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 48.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 5 number of Months.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month May 2017.
There is a difference of 48.0 between the maximum Month June 2018 and minimum Month May 2017.
Month June 2018 is higher than any other Months with value 50.0, followed by September 2017, and August 2017. Down to Month May 2017 with the lowest value 2.0.
Over the past 5 Months, the Unit sales in millions has reduced.
The Month May 2017 has 3.38 times less Unit sales in millions than average.
